oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Remarks concerning copies of Bushman Paintings, given by Colonel Durnfold to His Excellency Sir Bartle Frere. By /han=kasso (L VIII.-22. 7969-7972, 7974 and 7975, 7983-7993, 23. 7995-8004). The mode of shooting practised by the |nusa Bushmen. By /han=kass'o (L VIII.-22. 7972-7974). |han=kass'o identifies and describes various groups of people (as they appear in a copy of rock painting no. 2).
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Notes on rock painting copy no. 2 (!nu'sa and other groups)
